title: Congress of Vienna
summary: The Congress of Vienna took place after %{Napoleon's defeat at Waterloo#Napoleons defeat at Waterloo}. The Congress was a meeting of European leaders to discuss the future of Europe. The Congress was successful in creating a balance of power in Europe that would last for nearly a century. It was led by one Austrian diplomat named %{Klemens von Metternich#Klemens von Metternich}.
